<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===- DFAJumpThreading.cpp - Threads a switch statement inside a loop ----===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Transform each threading path to effectively jump thread the DFA. For</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// example, the CFG below could be transformed as follows, where the cloned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// blocks unconditionally branch to the next correct case based on what is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// identified in the analysis.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//          sw.bb                        sw.bb</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        /   |   \\                    /   |   \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   case1  case2  case3          case1  case2  case3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        \\   |   /                 |      |      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       determinator            det.2   det.3  det.1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        br sw.bb                /        |        \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                          sw.bb.2     sw.bb.3     sw.bb.1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                           br case2    br case3    br case1ยง</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Definitions and Terminology:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; Threading path:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   a list of basic blocks, the exit state, and the block that determines</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   the next state, for which the following notation will be used:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &lt; path of BBs that form a cycle &gt; &#91; state, determinator &#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; Predictable switch:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   The switch variable is always a known constant so that all conditional</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   jumps based on switch variable can be converted to unconditional jump.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; Determinator:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   The basic block that determines the next state of the DFA.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Representing the optimization in C-like pseudocode: the code pattern on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// left could functionally be transformed to the right pattern if the switch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// condition is predictable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  X = A                       goto A</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  for (...)                   A:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    switch (X)                  ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      case A                    goto B</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        X = B                 B:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      case B                    ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        X = C                   goto C</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The pass first checks that switch variable X is decided by the control flow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// path taken in the loop; for example, in case B, the next value of X is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// decided to be C. It then enumerates through all paths in the loop and labels</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the basic blocks where the next state is decided.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Using this information it creates new paths that unconditionally branch to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the next case. This involves cloning code, so it only gets triggered if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// amount of code duplicated is below a threshold.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/scalar/dfajumpthreading-h">llvm/Transforms/Scalar/DFAJumpThreading.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/smallset-h">llvm/ADT/SmallSet.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/statistic-h">llvm/ADT/Statistic.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/codemetrics-h">llvm/Analysis/CodeMetrics.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ThreadingPath is a path in the control flow of a loop that can be threaded</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// by cloning necessary basic blocks and replacing conditional branches with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// unconditional ones. A threading path includes a list of basic blocks, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// exit state, and the block that determines the next state.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-dfajumpthreading-cpp-/threadingpath"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-dfajumpthreading-cpp-/threadingpath">ThreadingPath</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\tphi: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;Phi &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SelectInst &#42;SelI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;SelectInst&gt;</a>(Current)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!isValidSelectInst(SelI))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlight">        addToQueue(SelI-&gt;getTrueValue(), CurrentIncomingBB, Q, SeenValues);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlight">        addToQueue(SelI-&gt;getFalseValue(), CurrentIncomingBB, Q, SeenValues);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\tselect: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;SelI &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;SelIUse = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(SelI-&gt;user&#95;back()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">          SelectInsts.push&#95;back(SelectInstToUnfold(SelI, SelIUse));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;Constant&gt;</a>(Current)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\tconst: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;Current &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\tother: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;Current &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Allow unpredictable values. The hope is that those will be the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// initial switch values that can be ignored (they will hit the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unthreaded switch) but this assumption will get checked later after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// paths have been enumerated (in function getStateDefMap).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the unpredictable value comes from the same inner loop it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// likely that it will also be on the enumerated paths, causing us to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exit after we have enumerated all the paths. This heuristic save</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// compile time because a search for all the paths can become expensive.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#abb8d208170fed25f5d5c1e10b7bab120">EarlyExitHeuristic</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a>-&gt;contains(LI-&gt;getLoopFor(CurrentIncomingBB))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\tExiting early due to unpredictability heuristic.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OptimizationRemarkAnalysis(<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/genericcycleimpl-h/#ad78e062f62e0d6e453941fb4ca843e4d">DEBUG&#95;TYPE</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;MaxPathLengthReached&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                          Switch)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlight">               &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Exploration stopped after visiting MaxPathLength=&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlight">               &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ore/#a5ca06dfbc998afac005414d8e9b7c234">ore::NV</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;MaxPathLength&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="#a09555143070f9bbf1eff018d0961fb44">MaxPathLength</a>) &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; blocks.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Res;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Visited.insert(BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (++NumVisited &gt; <a href="#a62535bfe808d2d71ec2127713a787886">MaxNumVisitiedPaths</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Res;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Stop if we have reached the BB out of loop, since its successors have no</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// impact on the DFA.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SwitchOuterLoop-&gt;contains(BB))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Res;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Some blocks have multiple edges to the same successor, and this set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is used to prevent a duplicate path from being generated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SmallSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt; Successors;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BasicBlock &#42;Succ : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a26e2a938b431eaa6eca2beaa96410c9d">successors</a>(BB)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Successors.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset/#afcadfef2cf37c3e6dbdbc9cd7bea50a0">insert</a>(Succ).second)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Found a cycle through the final block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Succ == ToBB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Res.push&#95;back(&#123;BB, ToBB&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We have encountered a cycle, do not get caught in it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Visited.contains(Succ))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;CurrLoop = LI-&gt;getLoopFor(BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Unlikely to be beneficial.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Succ == CurrLoop-&gt;getHeader())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skip for now, revisit this condition later to see the impact on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// coverage and compile time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LI-&gt;getLoopFor(Succ) != CurrLoop)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-dfajumpthreading-cpp-/#aef3dba239c07b585ffa167ff3aeb5721">PathsType</a> SuccPaths = paths(Succ, ToBB, Visited, PathDepth + 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PathType &amp;Path : SuccPaths) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Res.push&#95;back(Path);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Res.size() &gt;= <a href="#ad1ac49a4b0d9dadf5650df5c711f8210">MaxNumPaths</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This block could now be visited again from a different predecessor. Note</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that this will result in exponential runtime. Subpaths could possibly be</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function performs both a legality check and profitability check at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the same time since it is convenient to do so. It iterates through all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// blocks that will be cloned, and keeps track of the duplication cost. It</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// also returns false if it is illegal to clone some required block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> isLegalAndProfitableToTransform() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codemetrics">CodeMetrics</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinetracemetrics-cpp/#a6f3004139ef53bc2cf206b8864976928">Metrics</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/switchinst">SwitchInst</a> &#42;Switch = SwitchPaths-&gt;getSwitchInst();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t thread switch without multiple successors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Switch-&gt;getNumSuccessors() &lt;= 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that DuplicateBlockMap is not being used as intended here. It is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// just being used to ensure (BB, State) pairs are only counted once.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><span class="doxyHighlight">    InstructionCost DuplicationCost = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> JumpTableSize = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><span class="doxyHighlight">    TTI-&gt;getEstimatedNumberOfCaseClusters(&#42;Switch, JumpTableSize, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (JumpTableSize == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Factor in the number of conditional branches reduced from jump</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// threading. Assume that lowering the switch block is implemented by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// using binary search, hence the LogBase2().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CondBranches =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><span class="doxyHighlight">          APInt(32, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coro/#a36a5e731a6e92a83c26e5fee63d12380abbc155fb2b111bf61c4f5ff892915e6b">Switch</a>-&gt;getNumSuccessors()).ceilLogBase2();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(CondBranches &gt; 0 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;The threaded switch must have multiple branches&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DuplicationCost = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinetracemetrics-cpp/#a6f3004139ef53bc2cf206b8864976928">Metrics</a>.NumInsts / CondBranches;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compared with jump tables, the DFA optimizer removes an indirect branch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on each loop iteration, thus making branch prediction more precise. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// more branch targets there are, the more likely it is for the branch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// predictor to make a mistake, and the more benefit there is in the DFA</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// optimizer. Thus, the more branch targets there are, the lower is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cost of the DFA opt.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DuplicationCost = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinetracemetrics-cpp/#a6f3004139ef53bc2cf206b8864976928">Metrics</a>.NumInsts / JumpTableSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\nDFA Jump Threading: Cost to jump thread block &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; SwitchPaths-&gt;getSwitchBlock()-&gt;getName()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; is: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; DuplicationCost &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DuplicationCost &gt; <a href="#aa7c006860d37cf6192a6339a35743888">CostThreshold</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Not jump threading, duplication cost exceeds the &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;cost threshold.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ORE-&gt;emit(&#91;&amp;&#93;() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OptimizationRemarkMissed(<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/genericcycleimpl-h/#ad78e062f62e0d6e453941fb4ca843e4d">DEBUG&#95;TYPE</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;NotProfitable&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, Switch)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><span class="doxyHighlight">               &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Duplication cost exceeds the cost threshold (cost=&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><span class="doxyHighlight">               &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ore/#a5ca06dfbc998afac005414d8e9b7c234">ore::NV</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Cost&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, DuplicationCost)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><span class="doxyHighlight">               &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;, threshold=&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ore/#a5ca06dfbc998afac005414d8e9b7c234">ore::NV</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Threshold&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="#aa7c006860d37cf6192a6339a35743888">CostThreshold</a>) &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;).&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OptimizationRemark(<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/genericcycleimpl-h/#ad78e062f62e0d6e453941fb4ca843e4d">DEBUG&#95;TYPE</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;JumpThreaded&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, Switch)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Transform each threading path to effectively jump thread the DFA.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> createAllExitPaths() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><span class="doxyHighlight">    DomTreeUpdater DTU(&#42;DT, DomTreeUpdater::UpdateStrategy::Eager);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Move the switch block to the end of the path, since it will be duplicated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8472e46f9e4db168c5610ecdfb05dbaf">BasicBlock</a> &#42;SwitchBlock = SwitchPaths-&gt;getSwitchBlock();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ThreadingPath &amp;TPath : SwitchPaths-&gt;getThreadingPaths()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; TPath &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Fix exit path creation logic so that we dont need this</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="974"><span class="doxyHighlight">    updateSSA(NewDefs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="975"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="976"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Clean PHI Nodes for the newly created blocks</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="979"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="980"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="981"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// For a specific ThreadingPath \\p Path, create an exit path starting from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="982"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the determinator block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="983"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="984"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// To remember the correct destination, we have to duplicate blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="985"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// corresponding to each state. Also update the terminating instruction of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="986"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the predecessors, and phis in the successor blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="987"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> createExitPath(DefMap &amp;NewDefs, ThreadingPath &amp;Path,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="988"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      DuplicateBlockMap &amp;DuplicateMap,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="989"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      SmallSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 16&gt; &amp;BlocksToClean,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="990"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      DomTreeUpdater &#42;DTU) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="991"><span class="doxyHighlight">    APInt NextState = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#ac10322dc19a928c2dbb83ec9689dc23caac70412e939d72a9234cdebb1af5867b">Path</a>.getExitValue();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="992"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8472e46f9e4db168c5610ecdfb05dbaf">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Determinator = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#ac10322dc19a928c2dbb83ec9689dc23caac70412e939d72a9234cdebb1af5867b">Path</a>.getDeterminatorBB();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="993"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-dfajumpthreading-cpp-/#a3569446ca8c69cb8077feacd229b6f29">PathType</a> PathBBs = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#ac10322dc19a928c2dbb83ec9689dc23caac70412e939d72a9234cdebb1af5867b">Path</a>.getPath();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="994"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="995"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t select the placeholder block in front</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="996"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PathBBs.front() == Determinator)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="998"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="999"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DetIt = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a086e9fbdb06276db7753101a08a63adf">llvm::find</a>(PathBBs, Determinator);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1000"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When there is only one BB in PathBBs, the determinator takes itself as a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1001"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// direct predecessor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1002"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8472e46f9e4db168c5610ecdfb05dbaf">BasicBlock</a> &#42;PrevBB = PathBBs.size() == 1 ? &#42;DetIt : &#42;std::prev(DetIt);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1003"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BBIt = DetIt; BBIt != PathBBs.end(); BBIt++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1004"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8472e46f9e4db168c5610ecdfb05dbaf">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB = &#42;BBIt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1005"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BlocksToClean.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset/#afcadfef2cf37c3e6dbdbc9cd7bea50a0">insert</a>(BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1006"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1007"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We already cloned BB for this NextState, now just update the branch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1008"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and continue.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1009"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8472e46f9e4db168c5610ecdfb05dbaf">BasicBlock</a> &#42;NextBB = getClonedBB(BB, NextState, DuplicateMap);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1010"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NextBB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1019"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DuplicateMap&#91;BB&#93;.push&#95;back(&#123;NewBB, NextState&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1020"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BlocksToClean.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset/#afcadfef2cf37c3e6dbdbc9cd7bea50a0">insert</a>(NewBB);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1025"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Restore SSA form after cloning blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Each cloned block creates new defs for a variable, and the uses need to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// updated to reflect this. The uses may be replaced with a cloned value, or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1029"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// some derived phi instruction. Note that all uses of a value defined in the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Instruction &#42;New : Cloned)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1145"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if a successor has already been cloned for the particular exit</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Sets the successor of PrevBB to be NewBB instead of OldBB. Note that all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// other successors are kept as well.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> updatePredecessor(BasicBlock &#42;PrevBB, BasicBlock &#42;OldBB,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When a path is reused, there is a chance that predecessors were already</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!isPredecessor(OldBB, PrevBB))</span></CodeLine>
